hero.subtitle: Complete platform for OHS, Fire Safety and Occupational Health — automated compliance for employers in Romania and CEE.

features.title: Everything you need for compliance
features.subtitle: A single platform covering all legal requirements for occupational health and safety.
features.ssmDesc: Risk assessment, training records and complete OHS documentation, automatically generated.
features.psiDesc: Evacuation plans, periodic trainings and fire safety equipment inspections.
features.gdprDesc: Processing register, privacy policies and consent management.
features.nis2Desc: Compliance with NIS2 requirements for network and information system security.
features.medicalDesc: Automatic scheduling, fitness certificates and medical examination tracking.
features.iscirDesc: Equipment registry under ISCIR regulations, with periodic inspection notifications.
features.nearMissDesc: Quick incident and near-accident reporting with root cause analysis.
features.trainingDesc: Planning and tracking mandatory trainings with automatic reminders.
features.reportsDesc: Automatic generation of compliant reports, ready to print or send to authorities.

howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to total compliance.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Quick registration in less than 2 minutes. No credit card required.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Upload your employee list from Excel or add them manually, one by one.
howItWorks.step3Desc: The platform automatically generates documentation and notifies you at every deadline.

cta.title: Start today — first 30 days free
cta.subtitle: No credit card. No obligations. Set up your account in less than 2 minutes.

landing.title: OHS & Fire Safety Compliance
landing.subtitle: Manage occupational health, fire safety equipment, alerts and reports from a single platform. Zero paperwork, zero fines.
landing.featuresTitle: Everything you need in one place
landing.featuresSubtitle: 6 integrated modules for complete OHS & Fire Safety compliance

features.medicalDesc: Medical record tracking, automatic expiry alerts, complete employee records with real-time status.
features.equipmentDesc: Fire extinguisher inventory, hydrants, smoke detectors. Scheduled inspections, maintenance logs, QR code tracking.
features.alertsDesc: Daily email with imminent expirations (30/15/7 days). Resend integration, WhatsApp notifications (coming soon).
features.riskDesc: Automatic calculation of potential fines from labor and fire safety authorities. Min-max breakdown per authority.
features.multiOrgDesc: Manage 100+ companies from a single dashboard. Instant filtering, saved preferences, tenant architecture.
features.reportsDesc: Automatic report generation, SHA256 hash for immutability, cloud archiving, 1-click export.

pricing.title: Simple pricing, no surprises
pricing.subtitle: Choose the right plan for your company. All include 30 days free trial.
pricing.switchLabel: Switch between monthly and annual billing

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.q1: Can I test the platform before paying?
faq.a1: Yes, we offer a 30-day free trial for all plans, without requiring a credit card. You have full access to the features of your chosen plan and can cancel at any time.
faq.q2: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a2: We accept payments by bank card (Visa, Mastercard), bank transfer and invoice with deferred payment for the Enterprise plan. All invoices are issued in accordance with applicable tax legislation.
faq.q3: Can I cancel or change the plan at any time?
faq.a3: Absolutely. You can upgrade or downgrade at any time, and the price difference is calculated proportionally. Upon cancellation, you have access until the end of the current billing period. There are no penalties or hidden fees.
faq.q4: How is my company's data protected?
faq.a4: Data is stored on secure servers in the EU, with end-to-end encryption (AES-256). We are GDPR compliant and perform daily automatic backups and quarterly security audits.
faq.q5: Can I switch from Starter to Professional at any time?
faq.a5: Yes, you can upgrade instantly. The price difference is calculated pro-rata for the remaining period. Migration happens instantly, without data loss.
faq.q6: Is there a discount for annual payment?
faq.a6: The displayed prices are annual rates. Compared to monthly payment, annual payment means a saving of approximately 20%. For multi-year plans (3+ years) or multiple organizations, contact us for a personalized offer.
